content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or opinions. However, I can suggest that hiking is a must-try activity in the Natural Park of the Moncayo mountain in Aragón. It allows visitors to explore the park's beautiful landscapes and provides an opportunity to get up close with the flora and fauna. Besides, there are many different hiking trails to choose from, depending on the level of difficulty and time constraints, making it an accessible activity for most visitors.
